Package com.hire.dao

Interface EmployeeDaoInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmployeeDao
public interface EmployeeDaoInterface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean delete​(Employee v)
    Deletes a givent employee in datasource
    java.util.List<Employee> getAll()
    Returns the list of all the employees
    Employee getByid​(int id)
    Retrieves an employee by its id
    java.lang.String getPosition​(java.lang.String s)
    Returns the position of an employee according to it's username
    Employee login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
    Tries to log in an employee according to an username and a password (already encrypted).
    int register​(Employee user)
    Registers a new employee in datasource
    Employee update​(Employee v)
    Updates an employee in datasource according to changes done in the given employee instance

  • Method Details

    • login

      Employee login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Tries to log in an employee according to an username and a password (already encrypted).
      Parameters:
      username - The employee username
      password - The employee password
      Returns:
      If log in succeeds, the employee data, null otherwise

    • register

      int register​(Employee user)
      Registers a new employee in datasource
      Parameters:
      user - The new employee to add in datasource
      Returns:
      The new employee's id

    • getPosition

      java.lang.String getPosition​(java.lang.String s)
      Returns the position of an employee according to it's username
      Parameters:
      s - The employee's username
      Returns:
      The employee's position which is the name of the employee's class

    • getAll

      java.util.List<Employee> getAll()
      Returns the list of all the employees
      Returns:
      The list of all the employees

    • getByid

      Employee getByid​(int id)
      Retrieves an employee by its id
      Parameters:
      id - The employee's id
      Returns:
      The employee instance or null if not found

    • update

      Employee update​(Employee v)
      Updates an employee in datasource according to changes done in the given employee instance
      Parameters:
      v - The modified employee instance
      Returns:
      The newly updated instance

    • delete

      boolean delete​(Employee v)
      Deletes a givent employee in datasource
      Parameters:
      v - The employee to delete in datasrouce
      Returns:
      True if it succeeds, else false
